trans-unit.source: Provides a specialized <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is optimized for loading images using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Fornece um especializadas <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que está otimizada para carregar imagens com [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage existe principalmente para suportar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] sintaxe e introduz as propriedades adicionais para o mapa de bits carregar que não é definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: Alterações de propriedade só podem ocorrer durante a inicialização do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>para assinalar que inicialização foi iniciada e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>para assinalar que inicialização foi concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, alterações de propriedades são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage objetos criados utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>automaticamente são inicializados de construtor e alterações de propriedades são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para inicializar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>criado com este construtor, tem de efetuar a inicialização de propriedade entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>chamadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class by using the supplied <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> classe utilizando o <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> fornecido

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>objetos criados utilizando este construtor automaticamente foram inicializados.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, alterações de propriedades são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> to use as the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>para utilizar como origem do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The uriSource parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uriSource parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file specified by the uriSource parameter is not found.
trans-unit.target: O ficheiro especificado pelo uriSource parâmetro não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class with an image whose source is a <xref:System.Uri>, and is cached according to the provided <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> classe com uma imagem cuja origem é um <xref:System.Uri>e é colocado em cache, de acordo com o fornecido <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>objetos criados utilizando este construtor automaticamente foram inicializados.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, alterações de propriedades são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> to use as the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>para utilizar como origem do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref> that specifies the caching requirements for images that are obtained using HTTP.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"> </xref> que especifica os requisitos de colocação em cache para imagens que são obtidos através de HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The uriSource parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uriSource parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file specified by the uriSource parameter is not found.
trans-unit.target: O ficheiro especificado pelo uriSource parâmetro não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the base <xref:System.Uri> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a base de <xref:System.Uri>de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> contexto.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Uri> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: A base de <xref:System.Uri>do contexto atual.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizar o início do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> inicialização.

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Inicialização de propriedade tem de ser efetuada entre BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>chamadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>foi inicializado, alterações de propriedades são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> está atualmente a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: BeginInit has already been called.
trans-unit.target: BeginInit já foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> já foram inicializados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> to use for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref> a utilizar para esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set the CacheOption to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close a stream used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o CacheOption para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>se pretende fechar um fluxo utilizado para criar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>opção cache mantém o acesso no fluxo até que a imagem não é necessário e limpeza é processada pelo garbage collector.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de dados e as referências do recurso (poderá já não resolvem), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> objeto, tornando profundas cópias dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: As referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura, em pixels, que é descodificar a imagem para.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>também é definido, a proporção do mapa de bits é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>não está definido, a proporção permanece igual.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs nativamente descodificar a imagem para o tamanho especificado; outros codecs descodificar a imagem de tamanho original e dimensionar a imagem para o tamanho pretendido.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, que é descodificar a imagem para.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 0.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight*>

trans-unit.target: Se<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> também é definido, a proporção do mapa de bits é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs nativamente descodificar a imagem para o tamanho especificado; outros codecs descodificar a imagem de tamanho original e dimensionar a imagem para o tamanho pretendido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is downloading content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> está a transferir conteúdo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> does not support the Metadata property and will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>não suporta a propriedade de metadados e irá gerar um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to read the Metadata occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre uma tentativa de ler os metadados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is rotated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ângulo que isto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> roda para.

trans-unit.source: Rotation is performed after scaling.
trans-unit.target: Rotação é efetuada depois de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: This means that an image that has a Rotation of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> of 10, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que uma imagem que tenha uma rotação de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>de 10, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>de 5 resultará numa imagem que tenha uma largura de 5 e uma altura de 10.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>

trans-unit.target: A rotação do que é utilizada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stream source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem de fluxo do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If StreamSource and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A> are both set, the StreamSource value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se StreamSource e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>estão ambos definidos, StreamSource valor é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close the stream after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> is created.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>se de que pretende fechar a sequência depois do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>é criado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>opção cache mantém o acesso no fluxo até que o mapa de bits não é necessário e limpeza é processada pelo garbage collector.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the caching policy for images that come from an HTTP source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a política de colocação em cache para imagens provenientes de uma origem HTTP.

trans-unit.source: UriCachePolicy is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: UriCachePolicy é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
